ygData.subject: RE: Effects of AGI
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Of course with a drum and chant, you can t hit too hard anyway :)  I have no specific tests to prove it, but it *seems* that I get more hits in when My dex
ygData.messageBody:
> I would like to know if there is significant benefit to agi and dex above
> 120 and 130 levels - compared to 100-110. With drum and chant, my dex
> goes
> to like 160 (ya, I have some really insane stat boosting jewelry.)
>
> Sylly Songsynger
> Bard of the 30th song
> <Spirit of the Moon>
> somewhere on Innoruuk
>
Of course with a drum and chant, you can't hit too hard anyway :) I
have no specific tests to prove it, but it *seems* that I get more hits in
when My dex is above 130, compared to unbuffed 105. Of course, we've been
through the arguments about seeing what you want to see, so that's probably
a good portion of it. I think the problem with testing, is I'd have to duel
someone, not just go for mobs. Maybe I'll talk a level 22 bard friend of
mine into a duel sometime this week, with and without buffs.


Bien
